name: Conductor (WIP)
description:
A small idea inspired by an unused theme suggested in a game jam that I participated in earlier this year.

Race against the clock to see how long you can make your conga line go. Build up the combo meter to score more points until there is no more room to move.

I might explore this idea further in the future when I have more experience with Unity and modelling. I would hope to add:

- A larger and more dynamic spawn system for the NPCs

- Models for the player and NPCs.

- Update the levels to be more vibrant and varied.

- At least one more level

I would love some feedback on what you think of the concept. Anything at all
